StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIHasAEPUpload]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int, @HasAEPUpload bit OUTPUT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SET @HasAEPUpload = 0
IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 [FILE_NAME] FROM AEP_FILE_UPLOAD_LOG WHERE PERSON_ID = @PersonID) BEGIN SET @HasAEPUpload = 1 END
IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 [ID] FROM USMC.SF86Transac.on WHERE PersonID = @PersonID) BEGIN SET @HasAEPUpload = 1 END
IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 [ID] FROM USMC.BIQ_QUESTIONNAIRE WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID) BEGIN SET @HasAEPUpload = 1 END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
